name: Falling Cubes in Space
description:
As I was reorganizing my external hard drive for my Project Cy content, I rediscovered an old Game Maker prototype developed 9 years ago in 2014, before my high school senior year.

Controls:

Left/Right Arrow Keys - Move Spacepod

Space Bar - Shoot/Start (you can also press and hold for rapid fire)

Info: Control the Spacepod and shoot the cubes then shoot the circle to reach the next level. 

Credits:

Thank you Game Maker for the development and customers who purchased the game and Shaun Spaulding, Jupiter Hadley & TheNewBoston for the tutorials.

Thanks to PixelArtor for the graphics. http://pixelartor.com/

Sound thanks to SoundJax. http://soundjax.com/space-1.html

Thank you to the old school developers from my childhood and up, without you guys, I would've never had imaginative inspirations and aspirations.

And a final, special thanks to my loved ones who didn't give up on my goals including myself.

DISCLAIMER: I have more games, this was an old prototype I developed back in high school!
